full_summary:
=====================================

### Highway Renovations, Gulf Shore Parkway, Prince Edward Island

**Tender Notice Reference**: PW-23-01018284

**Solicitation Number**: 5P468-22-0223/A

**Publication Date**: January 10, 2023

### Description of Work
Parks Canada is seeking the services of a heavy civil contractor to renovate various sections of the existing Gulf Shore Parkway, situated on Prince Edward Island. The selected contractor will also be responsible for protecting the existing highway embankment by various means utilizing imported granite or sandstone.

### Period of Contract and Delivery Date
The contractor is required to perform and complete the work by June 16, 2023.

### Contract Requirements General

*   Contract requirements are specified in the accompanying solicitation documents.
*   Performance of work must comply with the National Park Act and its associated regulations.
*   Bidders must be aware of their contractual obligations and responsibilities.

### Responsabilities

*   Bidders must submit their bid via fax or email as indicated in the solicitation documents.
*   Bids will be accepted as official if submitted via fax or email.
*   Emails with links to bid documents will not be accepted.

### Enquiry and Clarification Process

*   Bidders must direct all enquiries and questions to the Contracting Authority.
*   Enquiries and responses will be considered in a timely manner.
*   Bidders are required to communicate with the Contracting Authority to confirm their attendance at the site visit.

### Evaluation Criteria

*   Evaluation of bids will be based on their technical and commercial merits.
*   The Contracting Authority will assess bids based on factors including Bidder experience, qualifications, capabilities, and past performance.

### Compliance with Obligations

*   The successful Bidder must demonstrate compliance with the applicable Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and regulations.
*   The successful Bidder must demonstrate their ability to operate successfully in a sole-sourced environment.
*   The successful Bidder must be aware of their ongoing contract management obligations.

### Contact Information

*   Contracting Authority: Sheldon Lalonde, Email: Shaun Lalonde@pc.gc.ca, Phone: 343-585-3836, Fax: 1-855-983-1808
*   Prčipe Island contact address: Parks Canada, Route 7, Tulita, IN, X0A 1X0
*   Website: www.parkscanada.gc.ca

Attachments are available at: <
